name: BURST WITCH
description:
BURST WITCH is a bullet hell game with the classic scrolling shooter gameplay.
Control different Witches to fight all kinds of enemies and enjoy the most exciting bullet hell experience with a wealth of ammo types and epic music!

【Ⅰ】Customize Ammo Combination Freely

Wider attack range, better penetration, homing bullets… a wealth of options to build your own ammo combination.

【Ⅱ】Gothic Art Style

Beautiful character portraits and 3D battle scenes.

【Ⅲ】Incredible Original Music

Symphonic and jazz music delivers an immersive fighting experience.
